mapper.select: SELECT MAX(seq) FROM peripheral_infect_device WHERE model_id = #{model_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO peripheral_infect_device ( model_id, seq, device_type_id, model_name, updated_by, updated_time )VALUES( #{model_id}, #{seq}, #{device_type_id}, #{model_name}, #{updated_by}, current_timestamp)
mapper.select: SELECT pid.model_id, pid.device_type_id, pid.seq, dt.name as device_type_name, pid.model_name, cjm.check_file_manage_id, cjm.check_manage_code, pidom.device_manage_id FROM peripheral_infect_device pid JOIN material m ON pid.model_id = m.model_id JOIN check_file_manage cjm ON cjm.devices_type_id = pid.device_type_id and (cjm.specified_model_name is null OR cjm.specified_model_name = '' OR cjm.specified_model_name regexp CONCAT('(^|;)', pid.model_name, '($|;)')) and cjm.access_place = 9 and cjm.delete_flg = 0 LEFT JOIN devices_type dt ON dt.devices_type_id = pid.device_type_id LEFT JOIN peripheral_infect_device_of_material pidom ON pidom.seq = pid.seq and pidom.material_id = #{material_id} and pidom.position_id = #{position_id} and pidom.rework = #{rework} WHERE m.material_id = #{material_id} ORDER BY pid.seq asc,pid.model_name
mapper.insert: Replace Into peripheral_infect_device_of_material ( material_id, position_id, rework, seq, device_manage_id )VALUES( #{material_id}, #{position_id}, #{rework}, #{seq}, #{device_manage_id})
